trans-unit.source: How to Use the BrokeredMessage.Defer Method
trans-unit.target: How to Use the BrokeredMessage.Defer Method

trans-unit.source: When using the <token>sb2</token> <externalLink><linkText>BrokeredMessage</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.brokeredmessage.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> class, you have the option of leaving a message in the queue using the <externalLink><linkText>Defer</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.brokeredmessage.defer.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> method.
trans-unit.target: When using the <token>sb2</token> <externalLink><linkText>BrokeredMessage</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.brokeredmessage.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> class, you have the option of leaving a message in the queue using the <externalLink><linkText>Defer</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.brokeredmessage.defer.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> method.

trans-unit.source: The deferred message can be processed later, at your discretion.
trans-unit.target: The deferred message can be processed later, at your discretion.

trans-unit.source: Message deferral is useful for prioritizing messages, or for postponing a message that depends on some other process.
trans-unit.target: Message deferral is useful for prioritizing messages, or for postponing a message that depends on some other process.

trans-unit.source: After processing the message, you can call the <externalLink><linkText>Complete</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.brokeredmessage.complete.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> method to delete the message from the queue.
trans-unit.target: After processing the message, you can call the <externalLink><linkText>Complete</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.brokeredmessage.complete.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> method to delete the message from the queue.

trans-unit.source: To use either the <externalLink><linkText>Defer</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.brokeredmessage.defer.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> or <externalLink><linkText>Complete</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.brokeredmessage.complete.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> method, set the queue client mode to <externalLink><linkText>ReceiveMode.PeekLock</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.receivemode.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> by calling the <externalLink><linkText>CreateQueueClient</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh293096.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> method of the <externalLink><linkText>MessagingFactory</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.messagingfactory.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> class.
trans-unit.target: To use either the <externalLink><linkText>Defer</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.brokeredmessage.defer.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> or <externalLink><linkText>Complete</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.brokeredmessage.complete.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> method, set the queue client mode to <externalLink><linkText>ReceiveMode.PeekLock</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.receivemode.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> by calling the <externalLink><linkText>CreateQueueClient</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh293096.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> method of the <externalLink><linkText>MessagingFactory</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.messagingfactory.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> class.

trans-unit.source: When you defer the message, add the message <externalLink><linkText>SequenceNumber</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.brokeredmessage.sequencenumber.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> to a collection.
trans-unit.target: When you defer the message, add the message <externalLink><linkText>SequenceNumber</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.brokeredmessage.sequencenumber.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> to a collection.

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the message, call the <externalLink><linkText>Receive</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh330765.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> method of the <externalLink><linkText>QueueClient</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.queueclient.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> class.
trans-unit.target: To retrieve the message, call the <externalLink><linkText>Receive</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh330765.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> method of the <externalLink><linkText>QueueClient</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.queueclient.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> class.

trans-unit.source: Pass the sequence number of the message as an argument to the <externalLink><linkText>Receive</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh330765.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> method.
trans-unit.target: Pass the sequence number of the message as an argument to the <externalLink><linkText>Receive</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh330765.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> method.

trans-unit.source: To ensure that the message can be recalled, store the sequence numbers in a durable store.
trans-unit.target: To ensure that the message can be recalled, store the sequence numbers in a durable store.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, if the process fails, the record of the deferred messages will be lost.
trans-unit.target: Otherwise, if the process fails, the record of the deferred messages will be lost.

trans-unit.source: To end the deferral, call the <externalLink><linkText>Complete</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.brokeredmessage.complete.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> method on each message, as needed.
trans-unit.target: To end the deferral, call the <externalLink><linkText>Complete</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.brokeredmessage.complete.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> method on each message, as needed.

trans-unit.source: For a sample app that demonstrates the <externalLink><linkText>Defer</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.brokeredmessage.defer.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> method, see <externalLink><linkText>Brokered Messaging: Deferred Messages</linkText><linkUri>http://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsazure/Brokered-Messaging-ccc4f879</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For a sample app that demonstrates the <externalLink><linkText>Defer</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.brokeredmessage.defer.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> method, see <externalLink><linkText>Brokered Messaging: Deferred Messages</linkText><linkUri>http://code.msdn.microsoft.com/windowsazure/Brokered-Messaging-ccc4f879</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: To create the queue client
trans-unit.target: To create the queue client

trans-unit.source: Add references to the following namespaces.
trans-unit.target: Add references to the following namespaces.

trans-unit.source: Create a <externalLink><linkText>MessagingFactory</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.messagingfactory.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> instance, and call the <externalLink><linkText>CreateQueueClient</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh293096.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> method.
trans-unit.target: Create a <externalLink><linkText>MessagingFactory</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.messagingfactory.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> instance, and call the <externalLink><linkText>CreateQueueClient</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh293096.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> method.

trans-unit.source: To create the <externalLink><linkText>MessagingFactory</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.messagingfactory.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> object, retrieve the Service Bus namespace URI, the <externalLink><linkText>Shared Access Signature</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn170477.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> (SAS) key name (default: <languageKeyword>RootManageSharedAccessKey</languageKeyword>), and the SAS key itself from the Azure management portal.
trans-unit.target: To create the <externalLink><linkText>MessagingFactory</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.messagingfactory.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> object, retrieve the Service Bus namespace URI, the <externalLink><linkText>Shared Access Signature</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn170477.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> (SAS) key name (default: <languageKeyword>RootManageSharedAccessKey</languageKeyword>), and the SAS key itself from the Azure management portal.

trans-unit.source: To defer the message
trans-unit.target: To defer the message

trans-unit.source: Create a generic <externalLink><linkText>List</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6sh2ey19.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> of type <languageKeyword>long</languageKeyword> to store the numbers.
trans-unit.target: Create a generic <externalLink><linkText>List</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6sh2ey19.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> of type <languageKeyword>long</languageKeyword> to store the numbers.

trans-unit.source: Call the <externalLink><linkText>Receive</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh330765.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> method on the client.
trans-unit.target: Call the <externalLink><linkText>Receive</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh330765.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> method on the client.

trans-unit.source: Check each message for deferral criteria, and call the <externalLink><linkText>Defer</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.brokeredmessage.defer.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> method as needed.
trans-unit.target: Check each message for deferral criteria, and call the <externalLink><linkText>Defer</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.brokeredmessage.defer.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> method as needed.

trans-unit.source: Add the sequence number to the List collection.
trans-unit.target: Add the sequence number to the List collection.

trans-unit.source: To process the deferred message
trans-unit.target: To process the deferred message

trans-unit.source: Iterate through the collection of sequence numbers using the <externalLink><linkText>Receive</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh330765.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> method.
trans-unit.target: Iterate through the collection of sequence numbers using the <externalLink><linkText>Receive</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/hh330765.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> method.

trans-unit.source: The <codeInline>ProcessMessage</codeInline> method calls the <externalLink><linkText>Complete</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.brokeredmessage.complete.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> method on each message.
trans-unit.target: The <codeInline>ProcessMessage</codeInline> method calls the <externalLink><linkText>Complete</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.brokeredmessage.complete.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> method on each message.

trans-unit.source: For a sample application that demonstrates the <externalLink><linkText>Defer</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.brokeredmessage.defer.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> method, see <externalLink><linkText>Brokered Messaging: Deferred Messages</linkText><linkUri>http://code.msdn.microsoft.com/Brokered-Messaging-ccc4f879</linkUri></externalLink>,
trans-unit.target: For a sample application that demonstrates the <externalLink><linkText>Defer</linkText><linkUri>https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/microsoft.servicebus.messaging.brokeredmessage.defer.aspx</linkUri></externalLink> method, see <externalLink><linkText>Brokered Messaging: Deferred Messages</linkText><linkUri>http://code.msdn.microsoft.com/Brokered-Messaging-ccc4f879</linkUri></externalLink>,
